sense.def:
One's sense of taste
je človekova sposobnost, da z jezikom prepozna okus stvari.

The taste of something
je okus nečesa, na primer sladek ali slan.

seg.quote: The soup was peppered and spiced to improve the taste.

sense.def:
To taste
pomeni imeti določen okus.

seg.quote: The tea tasted faintly of bitter almonds.

sense.def:
To taste something
pomeni zaznavati okus nečesa, kar jemo ali pijemo.

seg.quote: Roger chewed and swallowed so fast that he hardly tasted the meat.

sense.def:
To taste food or drink
pomeni dati v usta majhno količino hrane ali pijače, da ugotovimo, kakšen okus ima.

seg.quote: He insisted on pouring the wine for a guest to taste.

sense.def:
To have a taste of food or drink
pomeni dati v usta majhno količino hrane ali pijače, da vidimo, kakšen okus ima.

seg.quote: I opened one of the bottles and had a taste of the contents.

sense.def:
To have a taste for something
pomeni uživati v nečem.

seg.quote: He had not lost the taste for power.

sense.def:
To have a taste of a state or activity
pomeni za krajši čas izkusiti neko stanje ali dejavnost.

seg.quote: The child may already have had a taste of street life.

sense.def:
One's taste
je to, da so nekomu nekatere stvari všeč, druge pa ne.

seg.quote: She has very good taste in clothes.
Her novels are too violent for my taste.

sense.def:
Kar je
in bad taste
, je nekoliko žaljivo. Kar je
in good taste
, ni žaljivo.

seg.quote: That remark was in rather poor taste.
